function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Inaccurate estimation of infection spread in a population","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Delayed detection of non-detected covid-19 cases","category":"Settlement","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Preprints with impossible numbers and duplicate data circulating online without formal retraction","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Transmission of contagious diseases through research activities","category":"Biodiversity","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Unclear responsibility for managing and evaluating preprints","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Difficulty carrying out face-to-face surveys during peak breakout of covid-19 and subsequent epidemic prevention periods","category":"Public Space","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Strict epidemic prevention and control measures limiting the scope of surveys","category":"Public Space","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Covid-19 pandemic impact on virtual and physical space","category":"Public Space","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Fundamental change in the concept of community space","category":"Nature","confidence":"High"},{"name":"The spatial configuration requirements for new facilities in the community life circles may lead to increased construction activity and potential disruption to existing infrastructure.","category":"Nature","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Low usage of non-contact medical services","category":"Dwelling","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Substitution effect on medical and health service allocation","category":"Dwelling","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Decreased satisfaction with existing facilities","category":"Public Space","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased frequency of using community facilities","category":"Public Space","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Increased demand for community cultural and sports facilities in the 5-min community life circle","category":"Public Space","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Decreased demand for community cultural and sports facilities in the 15-min and 10-min community life circles","category":"Public Space","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Field survey interviews potentially increasing exposure to contagious diseases","category":"Public Space","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Using questionnaire survey and field research methods to gather first-hand information","category":"Public Space","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Population density in urban areas","category":"Settlement","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate pandemic prevention and control measures","category":"Settlement","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of compliance with government standards for community service facilities","category":"Settlement","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Non-contact interactive activities may contribute to the spread of contagious diseases within the community.","category":"Public Space","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate adaptation to changing needs of residents","category":"Neighbourhoods/Districts","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of coordination between physical and virtual elements in community planning","category":"Neighbourhoods/Districts","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Community planning ignoring new technological elements","category":"Neighbourhoods/Districts","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate fairness, accessibility, and optimization of supply allocation","category":"Neighbourhoods/Districts","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Use of multisource data, arcgis, and una for community planning","category":"Neighbourhoods/Districts","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reconfiguration of urban space due to technology","category":"Neighbourhoods/Districts","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Importance of community-based spatial unit","category":"Neighbourhoods/Districts","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Community life circle planning model","category":"Neighbourhoods/Districts","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Detection of sars-cov-2 rna in sewage samples from a hospital","category":"Water","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Limitations in the study, including small sample size and lack of air sampling for sars-cov-2 rna detection","category":"Water","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Detection of sars-cov-2 rna on object surfaces in a hospital isolation ward","category":"Water","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Positive stool specimen for sars-cov-2 rna in patient with mechanical ventilation","category":"Water","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"High hand hygiene compliance of staff and effectiveness of disinfection measures in isolation wards","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate disinfection and cleaning of hospital equipment and surfaces may lead to the transmission of sars-cov-2 and other infectious diseases.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transformation of general hospital wards into temporary isolation wards may lead to concerns about infection control and environmental safety.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Generation of respiratory aerosols from medical ventilators increases the risk of occupationally acquired infection among healthcare personnel.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Sewage samples positive for sars-cov-2 rna","category":"Water","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Rt-pcr testing for sars-cov-2 virus detection","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Virus isolation and culture in biosafety level 3 bsl-3 laboratory","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Detection of viral rna in isolation ward environment and staff ppe","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Insufficient disinfection of indoor air and surfaces","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate sampling and testing of patient and staff samples","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Incomplete environmental sampling and ppe site sampling","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Contamination of hospital environment with sars-cov-2 rna","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Pathogen contamination in the hospital environment","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Detection of sars-cov-2 rna on hospital surfaces","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Overloading of the hotline system","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"High requirement of technical personnel and high costs","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium-high"}]}
